description: This file defines the MatchingService class, which provides functionality to persist match results related to resume analysis. It interacts with the MatchRepository to save match data, encapsulating the creation of Match objects based on analysis input.

classes.name: MatchingService
classes.description: Service class responsible for persisting match results based on analysis data.

methods.name: createMatch
methods.description: Creates and saves a Match object based on user ID and analysis data, returning the saved Match.
